document_data.mainbody:
orsh was the eldest son of a cattle rancher who was abducted and enslaved by the Cult of the Dragon in 1369 DR.
Jorsh was known for his charismatic personality.
In 1369 DR, Jorsh was one of the unfortunate villagers captured by the Cult of the Dragons slavers. Alongside Tren, Wenta, and Ristim, the villagers were taken to the Cults hideout in the ruined Darnarests tower.
